name: Snac-Man
description:
An arcade twist of the classics Pac-Man and Snake! Take control of pac-man with an ever growing body to complete 3 puzzling levels in the best time possible! Or you can make, play and share your levels with others!

Special thanks to:

  • SquidInk for some game testing and splash art!
  • TimEdits for the music (make sure to check his games out on itch.io!

This game is in the early stages and will be developed based on the view, downloads and feedback gotten so make you  comment your thoughts after playing!

All feedback is read and listened to and donations happily accepted :)
